ygData.subject: RE: staff of observers
ygData.msgSnippet: not sure how to activate it, but once you do it is the absolutely most annoying spell to your group.  constantly pulses light and sound on them for what seems
ygData.messageBody:
not sure how to activate it, but once you do it is the absolutely most
annoying spell to your group. constantly pulses light and sound on them for
what seems like forever. either the guy who did it was a punk, or you can
really not turn it off once you start it.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L31 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server


>
> From: "Lim Dul" <sevendegrees@...>
>
> Got
> the Staff of Observers yesterday which is pretty cool. How
> do we get the
> Sentinel spell to work on the staff...we just right-click on
> the staff
> before medding?
